name: HalloweenSoundsforkids
0:
”Alexa, open halloween sounds for kids”
”Alexa, start halloween sounds for kids”
”Alexa, launch halloween sounds for kids”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: halloween sounds for kids
des: This sample skill shows you how to play a sound and have it loop and repeat after the file ends. This is great for sleep or relaxation type skills that play a sound until the user says "Alexa, Stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
